title: 'It got frosty!' Häkkinen and Coulthard to take F1 rivalry on tour
summary: Former McLaren F1 team-mates Mika Häkkinen and David Coulthard are set to renew old rivalries in a newEvening with...tour – they toldJames Elsonall about it

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Mika Häkkinen and David Coulthard both drive for during their Formula 1 careers?
What type of event are Mika Häkkinen and David Coulthard participating in to showcase their rivalry?
During which decade did Mika Häkkinen and David Coulthard have their notable rivalry in Formula 1?
